Divine Messenger Lydia:
You get it all done! I think You understood what the Corruptive Darkness. And knew her destructive power. The choice is yours even of the heroes whom the gods loved and protected. Of th suffered so much... And... And even snuck into Your world, bringing sickness and misfortune. Darkness had penetrated this far only thanks The Power Of Shillien.
Now we can talk to You. You deserve it... Tell me when you're ready to know the truth.
